snippet.title: Linger in Shadows™ - Official Trailer
snippet.description: Linger in Shadows is not a game, but rather an experiment into the realm of interactive digital art. Created by a collective of talented artists based in Poland known as Plastic, Linger in Shadows delivers cutting-edge graphics technology and is the first demoscene project to ever hit a home console. Bringing this underground digital art culture exclusively to the PlayStation®Network, it delivers a truly unique journey that will challenge and entertain you, and change the way you think about games and art forever.
